frame.name: Information
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Cognizer</fen> knows or comes to know some piece of <fen>Information</fen> about a <fen>Topic</fen>. In this frame, many LUs encode a specific <fen>Means_of_Gathering</fen> and/or <fen>Source</fen>, but these may also be expressed separately.
<ex>Also, the big problem is that <fex name="cog">our</fex> <fex name="inf"><t>intel</t></fex> <fex name="top">about WMD's</fex> has many times been wrong.</ex>
<ex> <fex name="Cognizer">Anyone</fex> <m>got</m> the <fex name="inf"><t>straight dope</t></fex> <fex name="Topic">on this</fex>? </ex>
<ex><m>Get</m> the <fex name="Source">inside</fex> <fex name="inf"><t>scoop</t></fex> <fex name="Topic">on sprint football player Austin Wilson</fex>. <fex name="Cognizer">CNI</fex></ex>
<ex>I know him pretty well and <fex name="Cognizer">I</fex> <m>have</m> a lot of <fex name="inf"><t>dirt</t></fex> <fex name="Topic">on him</fex> so I can always hold him over a barrel.</ex>
<ex><fex name="inf">What</fex><m>'s</m> the <t>info</t> <fex name="Topic">about the new scanner chip</fex>? <fex name="Cognizer">INI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Information
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Information that the Cognizer possesses or comes to posess.
<ex>Not long before Bill Marlin died, he shared with me his <t>information</t> <fex name="inf">that Mrs Wright was with her husband on the day Wright was born</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> is aware of the <fen>Information</fen>.
<ex><fex name="cog">Our</fex> <t>information</t> shows that soon after the turn of the 1900's, John Dazey was making can openers in the Dallas Texas area at the time.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Topic
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Topic</fen> is what the Information is about in general.
<ex>What happens to <fex name="Topic">my</fex> <t>information</t> if I quit my membership?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Source
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Cognizer</fen> obtains the Information from the <fen>Source</fen>.
<ex>How credible is the <t>information</t> <fex name="Source">from the Internet</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means_of_gathering
FE.definition:
<def-root>An action or method used by the <fen>Cognizer</fen> that results in the acquisition of the <fen>Information</fen>.
<ex>Who can see and use <fex name="Mea">survey</fex> <t>information</t>?</ex></def-root>
